repairedDockerfile:
FROM alpine 
MAINTAINER Andr√© Nishitani <atoshio25@gmail.com> 
RUN apk add --no-cache \--no-cache curl build-base \
&& curl -f -O https://cmake.org/files/v3.7/cmake-3.7.2.tar.gz \
&& mv cmake-3.7.2.tar.gz /tmp/ && cd /tmp \
&& tar -xzf cmake-3.7.2.tar.gz \
&& cd cmake-3.7.2 \
&& sh bootstrap \
&& make \
&& make install \
&& cd / && rm -r /tmp/cmake-3.7.2 && rm cmake-3.7.2.tar.gz
